text: Crack the Sky is an album recorded by Mylon LeFevre in 1987 and released in 1987. == Track listing == ==Personnel== * Mylon LeFevre - vocals, guitars * Ben Hewitt - digital drums, percussion * Kenneth Bentley - bass, vocals * Scott Allen - guitars, vocals * Paul Joseph - synthesizers, vocals * Michael Tyrrell - guitars, vocals * Trent Argante - guitars, vocals Category:1987 albums Category:Contemporary Christian music albums by American artists Category:Mylon LeFevre albums
title: Crack the Sky (Mylon LeFevre and Broken Heart album)
